xf:bind.message: Date first seen should be on or after Date of birth
Date cannot be less than the birthdate

xf:input.xf:label: Birth Date Estimated
xf:input.xf:hint: Is the patient birth date estimated?

xf:input.xf:label: Citizenship
xf:input.xf:hint: Country of which this person is a member

xf:select1.xf:label: Health Center
xf:select1.xf:hint: Specific Location of this person's home health center.

xf:input.xf:label: Health District
xf:input.xf:hint: District/region in which this patient' home health center resides

xf:input.xf:label: Mother's Name
xf:input.xf:hint: First or last name of this person's mother

xf:input.xf:label: Race
xf:input.xf:hint: Group of persons related by common descent or heredity

xf:input.xf:label: Telephone Number
xf:input.xf:hint: The telephone number for the person

xf:input.xf:label: Unknown patient
xf:input.xf:hint: Used to flag patients that cannot be identified during the check-in process

xf:input.xf:label: Test Patient
xf:input.xf:hint: Flag to describe if the patient was created to a test or not

xf:select1.xf:label: First Language
xf:select1.xf:hint: The first language spoken by the patient
